My friend and I went out of our way to find the best Thai place in Barcelona.  This was the third place we tried, and the only one we went back to (and by far, the best AND the most reasonable).  The red curry is their best curry, and is absolutely perfect.  Green was also great.  The fried rice was very mediocre, and was a let-down, but we didn't make that mistake twice.  We saw a couple having the pad thai, and it did look very good.  In fact, most of what we saw at other tables looked amazing.  But we're curry fanatics.  The staff is also very pleasant, attentive, and not pushy at all.  The area that this place is in is very nice too, and right off of Gracia, near Diagonal.  Very nice area to walk around in, day or evening.  Kinda like the Fifth Avenue (and 57th St.) area in Manhattan.  If you're in Barcelona, and missing Thai, then this is the place.
